body.p: Text mode is used for plain text editing.

Text mode is convenient for specific XML source code editing which can't be done in WYSIWYG mode:
Manually fixing invalid XML documents
Changing DOCTYPE declaration of the document
Changing the root element of the document
Regular authoring is not recommended in Text mode. To use the full power of XML functionality, switch to WYSIWYG mode: choose Tools Switch to WYSIWYG Mode or press F6.
In Text mode, the view of a document in the Editing Window is independent of the document type.
